title: Original Sin
description: Original Sin is book two in the Alexandra Jones series, the sequel to First Bitten.Alex has run. Leaving everything she knows and loves … Nathan, behind. She’s a fugitive; hiding from the Original Vârcolacs who want to claim her for themselves.Hiding in Italy, she has changed her identity and her appearance; working in a coffee shop in the quiet town of Sassano.Then Zeff steps into her life. He’s solid, sturdy, but more so he’s human – he’s someone real, tangible, a friend throwing her a lifeline in a world of loneliness.Believing she's safe from attack, nothing prepares Alex for what's lurking in the woods, on her doorstep, intoxicating her into a web of control and deceit.Danger is closer than her shadow ... the hunt is on again, forcing Alex into the hardest dilemma yet.
author: Samantha Towle
